mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(email, password, name) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, role, status FROM user WHERE name = #{nameOrEmail} OR email = #{nameOrEmail}
SELECT id, password, role, status FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{userId}
UPDATE user SET password = #{hashPassword} WHERE id = #{userId}
UPDATE user SET role = #{role} WHERE id = #{userId}
